nickname_garnet.description: Enters the nickname 'GARNET' for the Pokemon and confirms it. Assumes cursor starts at 'A'.
nickname_garnet.python_script:
import json
cmds = []
# G (0,6) from A(0,0)
cmds.extend(["Right"]*6)
cmds.append("A")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
# A (0,0) from G(0,6)
cmds.extend(["Left"]*6)
cmds.append("A")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
# R (1,8) from A(0,0)
cmds.append("Down")
cmds.extend(["Right"]*8)
cmds.append("A")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
# N (1,4) from R(1,8)
cmds.extend(["Left"]*4)
cmds.append("A")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
# E (0,4) from N(1,4)
cmds.append("Up")
cmds.append("A")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
# T (2,1) from E(0,4)
cmds.append("Down")
cmds.append("Down")
cmds.extend(["Left"]*3)
cmds.append("A")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
# END via Start
cmds.append("Start")
cmds.append("sleep 200")
cmds.append("A")
print(json.dumps(cmds))
